title: ICE / ACELE ON ICE
description: this is where the "recording device", "what are you doing here on the ice?" and "questioning" branches are located.

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""This?" She breathes on her freezin..."
dialogueTree.text: "This?" She breathes on her freezing fingers. "It's a portable recording device. It's for field recording. Low quality, but still."

links.title: You: ""And the wires?""
links.text: "And the wires?"

links.title: Acele: ""Actually just one wire, I picked o..."
links.text: "Actually just one wire, I picked on it till the braiding came loose. The wire leads to a contact microphone."

links.title: You: ""What's a 'contact microphone'?""
links.text: "What's a 'contact microphone'?"

links.title: Acele: ""A contact mic records sounds from..."
links.text: "A contact mic records sounds from inside things. Like this ice."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Your mangled brain would like you t..."
links.text: Your mangled brain would like you to know there is a boxer called Contact Mike.

links.title: You: "Yeah? Any news on my own name?"
links.text: Yeah? Any news on my own name?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Nope."
links.text: Nope.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You're welcome."
links.text: You're welcome.

links.title: You: "What am I supposed to do with this?"
links.text: What am I supposed to do with this?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "No idea."
links.text: No idea.

links.title: Interfacing: "Nice. You could maybe bug someone w..."
links.text: Nice. You could maybe bug someone with it? Wire tapping!

links.title: You: ""Does this have anything to do with..."
links.text: "Does this have anything to do with Contact Mike?"

links.title: Acele: ""Uh..." She's confused. "Yeah, I re..."
links.text: "Uh..." She's confused. "Yeah, I record stuff with it."

links.title: You: ""No, I mean the boxer Contact Mike.""
links.text: "No, I mean the boxer Contact Mike."

links.title: Acele: ""Ah! No. This is a *contact microph..."
links.text: "Ah! No. This is a *contact microphone*, it's for recording *inside* solid objects. Contact Mike just beats people up."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's not fair. And an understatem..."
links.text: That's not fair. And an understatement.

links.title: You: ""No, I mean... forget it.""
links.text: "No, I mean... forget it."

links.title: Acele: ""Sure.""
links.text: "Sure."

links.title: You: ""You know, Contact Mike doesn't *ju..."
links.text: "You know, Contact Mike doesn't *just beat people up*. Contact Mike is a role model."

links.title: Acele: ""Um...""
Rhetoric: "An entire *litany* spews forth!"
links.text: An entire *litany* spews forth!

links.title: You: ""Yes, you heard right. You should t..."
links.text: "Yes, you heard right. You should try to be more like Contact Mike: a successful athlete and an *inspirational figure* who has overcome social, physical, and mental obstacles."

links.title: Acele: ""Man, you are one weird cop.""
links.text: "Man, you are one weird cop."

links.title: You: ""This isn't about me. This is about..."
links.text: "This isn't about me. This is about your lack of respect for one of boxing's greats -- and for *yourself*."

links.title: Acele: ""What is it with you and this Mike..."
links.text: "What is it with you and this Mike guy?" She pauses. The question is rhetorical.

links.title: Acele: ""Okay, if it floats your boat I'll..."
links.text: "Okay, if it floats your boat I'll be more like Contact Mike and less like me."

links.title: You: ""Yes, that does indeed float my boa..."
links.text: "Yes, that does indeed float my boat."

links.title: Acele: ""Uh huh, good on you." She turns to..."
links.text: "Uh huh, good on you." She turns to check her tape recorder.

links.title: You: ""Self respect is not meant to float..."
links.text: "Self respect is not meant to float any boats but your own."

links.title: Acele: ""I'll keep that in mind, for future..."
links.text: "I'll keep that in mind, for future use." She turns to check her tape recorder.

links.title: You: ""I'd say I'm just about normal. Now..."
links.text: "I'd say I'm just about normal. Now about that mic -- Not Mike. Mic."

links.title: Acele: ""You do understand it all just soun..."
links.text: "You do understand it all just sounds like Mike to me, right?"

links.title: You: ""On second thought, screw Contact M..."
links.text: "On second thought, screw Contact Mike. He's not a champion -- you are! Look at you here in front of a saggy tent, picking your nose to drug-addict music. The world of sports is in awe of your faith and dedication."

links.title: You: ""Sorry, I don't know why I said tha..."
links.text: "Sorry, I don't know why I said that. There was something else I wanted to know..."

links.title: Acele: ""Yes?""
links.text: "Yes?"

links.title: You: ""How does that thing work?""
links.text: "How does that thing work?"

links.title: Acele: ""The mic? I don't exactly know. Som..."
links.text: "The mic? I don't exactly know. Somehow it doesn't pick up vibrations from the air. The box said it only picks up *structure-borne sound*. If you like technobabble."

links.title: You: ""Where did you get the mic from?""
links.text: "Where did you get the mic from?"

links.title: Acele: ""Same place I got the recorder from..."
links.text: "Same place I got the recorder from. The Paliseum."

links.title: You: ""What's The Paliseum?""
links.text: "What's The Paliseum?"

links.title: Acele: ""Oh man, you haven't been to The Pa..."
links.text: "Oh man, you haven't been to The Paliseum?" She forgets herself for a moment. "It's *the* coolest place in this whole drug-addled shithole."

links.title: Acele: ""It's a music club and a synthesize..."
links.text: "It's a music club and a synthesizer workshop. On Boogie Street, in Jamrock. Musicians live there, like... real musicians. I once saw Arno van Eyck!"

links.title: Empathy: "Thinking about it really cheers her..."
links.text: Thinking about it really cheers her up. It's a long way from here, though.

links.title: You: ""Sounds interesting. Who is this *A..."
links.text: "Sounds interesting. Who is this *Arno* guy?"

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, yeah. Egg's *really* into him...."
links.text: "Oh, yeah. Egg's *really* into him. Maybe even *too* into him. He's a pretty intense personality."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hey, didn't Pissf****t and Fuck the..."
links.text: Hey, didn't Pissf****t and Fuck the World mention van Eyck, too?

links.title: You: ""Is it like a SKULL thing?""
links.text: "Is it like a SKULL thing?"

links.title: Acele: ""A 'SKULL thing'?" She shakes her h..."
links.text: "A 'SKULL thing'?" She shakes her head. "Man, you sound like a hundred years old when you say that."

links.title: Composure: "No, you don't. She's mistaken you f..."
links.text: No, you don't. She's mistaken you for an old person! Say you're cool.

links.title: You: ""I'm pretty intense, too.""
links.text: "I'm pretty intense, too."

links.title: Acele: ""I... don't know what that means.""
links.text: "I... don't know what that means."

links.title: You: ""I grind.""
links.text: "I grind."

links.title: Acele: ""I don't know what that means eithe..."
links.text: "I don't know what that means either."

links.title: You: ""It means I'm hip beyond my years.""
links.text: "It means I'm hip beyond my years."

links.title: Acele: ""That's cool." She breathes on her..."
links.text: "That's cool." She breathes on her fingers. Looks like she doesn't know what to say.

links.title: You: ""You're right. Time has deserted me.""
links.text: "You're right. Time has deserted me."

links.title: Acele: ""Sucks, man." She squints her eyes..."
links.text: "Sucks, man." She squints her eyes for a second trying to remember something... then lets go of it. "Was there something else? About the contact mic, perhaps?"

links.title: You: ""Never mind, let's talk about that..."
links.text: "Never mind, let's talk about that contact mic instead..."

links.title: You: ""Nor do I, but I have concrete evid..."
links.text: "Nor do I, but I have concrete evidence that I rock. In the form of a wrecked tape player and a completely trashed hostel room."

links.title: You: ""Neither do I actually. I have no i..."
links.text: "Neither do I actually. I have no idea what I'm talking about. Get down? Grind?"

links.title: Acele: "She breathes on her fingers. Looks..."
links.text: She breathes on her fingers. Looks like she doesn't know what to say.

links.title: You: ""On second thought, let's go back t..."
links.text: "On second thought, let's go back to the contact mic."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh yeah..." She looks you over, as..."
links.text: "Oh yeah..." She looks you over, assessing your age. "Guess you wouldn't know van Eyck. Or really be a Paliseum-going kind of person... "

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hey, didn't Pissf****t and Fuck the..."
links.text: Hey, didn't Pissf****t and Fuck the World mention van Eyck, too?

links.title: You: ""I get down.""
links.text: "I get down."

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a place for congregati..."
links.text: "Sounds like a place for congregating homo-sexuals."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, there might be some. I don't..."
links.text: "Yeah, there might be some. I don't think they look down on the homo-sexual underground there. The Paliseum's not that kind of place. It's cool."

links.title: You: ""Because I have a problem with homo..."
links.text: "Because I have a problem with homo-sexuals. Major problem."

links.title: Acele: ""What *don't* you have a problem wi..."
links.text: "What *don't* you have a problem with?"

links.title: You: ""I also have a problem with alcohol.""
links.text: "I also have a problem with alcohol."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, I got that, but what *don't*..."
links.text: "Yeah, I got that, but what *don't* you have a problem with?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Women's fencing. It's an elegant ac..."
links.text: Women's fencing. It's an elegant activity.

links.title: You: ""Women's fencing. Great sport. No p..."
links.text: "Women's fencing. Great sport. No problem with that."

links.title: Acele: ""Good for you then. Women's fencing..."
links.text: "Good for you then. Women's fencing *is* a pretty graceful sight."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Agreed," the lieutenant notes."
links.text: "Agreed," the lieutenant notes.

links.title: You: ""I... can't think of anything. Ther..."
links.text: "I... can't think of anything. There's gotta be something, right? That would be normal for a human person."

links.title: Acele: ""You tell me." She breathes on her..."
links.text: "You tell me." She breathes on her fingers again; they're red from the cold.

links.title: Half Light: "You don't have any fuckin' problems..."
links.text: You don't have any fuckin' problems! Not a single one!

links.title: You: ""Fuck that! I'm completely problem..."
links.text: "Fuck that! I'm completely problem free, you can't tell me otherwise."

links.title: Acele: ""Mhm..." She breathes on her finger..."
links.text: "Mhm..." She breathes on her fingers again to warm them. "Thought so."

links.title: Acele: ""That's real cool. Hope you don't m..."
links.text: "That's real cool. Hope you don't mind missing out on all that great homo-sexual content the world has got to offer."

links.title: Acele: ""Now, uh... we were talking about m..."
links.text: "Now, uh... we were talking about my contact mic?" She picks up the device and inspects it, avoiding your eyes.

links.title: You: ""Yes, but before we return to the c..."
links.text: "Yes, but before we return to the contact mic -- tell me more about this *Arno* guy you mentioned."

links.title: You: ""Yes, contact mics.""
links.text: "Yes, contact mics."

links.title: Acele: ""Contact mics," she repeats, turnin..."
links.text: "Contact mics," she repeats, turning the device in her hand.

links.title: You: ""Don't get me wrong. I'm all for it..."
links.text: "Don't get me wrong. I'm all for it. This *Paliseum* just sounded like their kind of place."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay then. That's cool.""
links.text: "Okay then. That's cool."

links.title: You: ""Now about that *Arno* guy you ment..."
links.text: "Now about that *Arno* guy you mentioned."

links.title: You: ""Never mind all that. I had questio..."
links.text: "Never mind all that. I had questions about that mic..."

links.title: You: ""Oh no, you completely misunderstoo..."
links.text: "Oh no, you completely misunderstood me. I might be a homo-sexual myself."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh! Well, good for you.""
links.text: "Oh! Well, good for you."

links.title: You: ""Tell me more about the microphone.""
links.text: "Tell me more about the microphone."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I had some non-mic quest..."
links.text: "Actually, I had some non-mic questions for you."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Your mangled brain would like you t..."
links.text: Your mangled brain would like you to know there is a boxer called Contact Mike.

links.title: You: ""Got it.""
links.text: "Got it."

links.title: You: ""And what is it you're recording ex..."
links.text: "And what is it you're recording exactly?"

links.title: Acele: ""I *think* I'm recording cracks in..."
links.text: "I *think* I'm recording cracks in the ice, but there's no way to tell. Not without headphones. I think I just recorded your footsteps, too. Not sure how that will sound..." She scratches her forehead.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "What happened to the old headphones..."
links.text: What happened to the old headphones?

links.title: You: ""Wait, what happened to the headpho..."
links.text: "Wait, what happened to the headphones?"

links.title: Acele: ""My boyfriend sold them.""
links.text: "My boyfriend sold them."

links.title: You: ""What for?""
links.text: "What for?"

links.title: Acele: ""I don't know, man... things. Just..."
links.text: "I don't know, man... things. Just stuff you need for life."

links.title: Drama: "A lie. They were probably pawned of..."
links.text: A lie. They were probably pawned off for something ssssuspicious.

links.title: Drama: "Everything checks out, sire!"
links.text: Everything checks out, sire!

links.title: You: ""And what are these recordings for..."
links.text: "And what are these recordings for -- the cracks, the footsteps?"

links.title: Acele: ""The musicians in The Paliseum use..."
links.text: "The musicians in The Paliseum use them for making music. They loop the stuff, cutting the tapes together. They make music out of cracks in the ice and keys jangling... crazy sounds like that. It's hard to explain."

links.title: You: "Just nod."
links.text: Just nod.

links.title: Acele: ""Anyway, I thought I'd make some, t..."
links.text: "Anyway, I thought I'd make some, too. It's supposed to be, like, a music place anyway..." She rubs her shoulders and looks around.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The girl is cold all of a sudden. V..."
links.text: The girl is cold all of a sudden. Very cold.

links.title: Acele: ""I don't really know what I'm doing..."
links.text: "I don't really know what I'm doing. They use synthesizers, too. I don't have a synthesizer."

links.title: Empathy: "She looks at the recording device,..."
links.text: She looks at the recording device, the thing she thought would fill her hours with joy and escape. It's turning out to be an empty fantasy. She feels childish, very useless all of a sudden.

links.title: Composure: "The sharp drop in endorphins is alm..."
links.text: The sharp drop in endorphins is almost visible. Like a warm blanket has fallen off her shoulders -- the wave of chill, the quivering jaw. Indications of a drug high.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She is on some kind of stimulant --..."
links.text: She is on some kind of stimulant -- amphetamine or mephedrone -- and its effects are wearing off fast. She will begin to experience more and more valleys now. And fewer peaks.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Take this, you're cold." The lieut..."
links.text: "Take this, you're cold." The lieutenant begins to take off his jacket.

links.title: Acele: ""No man, fuck that, I'm cool... I'm..."
links.text: "No man, fuck that, I'm cool... I'm sorry I said that. I'm sorry about the *fuck*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's okay." The lieutenant backs u..."
links.text: "It's okay." The lieutenant backs up. He throws you a glance.

links.title: You: ""Want my jacket?" (Start taking it..."
links.text: "Want my jacket?" (Start taking it off.)

links.title: Acele: ""No, man. Fuck it, I'm cool... I'm..."
links.text: "No, man. Fuck it, I'm cool... I'm sorry I said that. I'm sorry about the *fuck*."

links.title: You: "Sigh."
links.text: Sigh.

links.title: Acele: "She's shivering a bit."
links.text: She's shivering a bit.

links.title: You: ""All right then.""
links.text: "All right then."

links.title: You: ""Now *this* is where a hat would co..."
links.text: "Now *this* is where a hat would come in handy."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah... maybe you were right about..."
links.text: "Yeah... maybe you were right about the hat."

links.title: You: "(Give her your hat.) "Here. You nee..."
links.text: (Give her your hat.) "Here. You need this more than I do."

links.title: Acele: ""See? That's the appropriate way to..."
links.text: "See? That's the appropriate way to give a girl a hat..."

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bi..."
links.text: "Thanks." She puts it on. It's a bit large for her.

links.title: Acele: ""Sorry, I don't really want that."..."
links.text: "Sorry, I don't really want that." She looks away.

links.title: You: ""You said *it's* supposed to be a m..."
links.text: "You said *it's* supposed to be a music place. What is?"

links.title: Acele: ""That." She nods toward the church...."
links.text: "That." She nods toward the church. "The boys think it could be a *place*, like The Paliseum or something. Stupid. It's really..." she pauses, "not gonna be a Paliseum, that's for sure."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "And who are these boys?"
links.text: And who are these boys?

links.title: You: ""The boys?""
links.text: "The boys?"

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah, Andre and the guys. They're..."
links.text: "Yeah, Andre and the guys. They're inside. In the tent."

links.title: Logic: "And why is that?"
links.text: And why is that?

links.title: You: ""Why are you freezing out here, whi..."
links.text: "Why are you freezing out here, while the boys are inside?"

links.title: Acele: ""They got too much stuff crammed in..."
links.text: "They got too much stuff crammed in there. No room."

links.title: You: ""Stuff like what?""
links.text: "Stuff like what?"

links.title: Acele: ""Music stuff mostly. Like this tape..."
links.text: "Music stuff mostly. Like this tape recorder, but bigger. And there's piles of it."

links.title: You: ""You mean like those headphones you..."
links.text: "You mean like those headphones your boyfriend sold."

links.title: Acele: ""Yup." She squints her eyes a littl..."
links.text: "Yup." She squints her eyes a little. "They were pretty... I'm sorry we sold those."

links.title: You: ""Why not just leave some of it outs..."
links.text: "Why not just leave some of it outside so you don't have to freeze?"

links.title: Acele: ""That stuff is more expensive than..."
links.text: "That stuff is more expensive than I am. More expensive than any of us, really. Doesn't matter. I can take the cold."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's probably amphetamine -- It mak..."
links.text: It's probably amphetamine -- It makes you *feel* impervious to the elements, but doesn't actually make you any less cold.

links.title: You: ""Why? Why can you take it?""
links.text: "Why? Why can you take it?"

links.title: Acele: ""I got my recordings to do, I feel..."
links.text: "I got my recordings to do, I feel better outside..." A wave breaks close-by and covers her in a cold spray.

links.title: You: "(Let it go.) "Got it...""
links.text: (Let it go.) "Got it..."

links.title: Acele: "She looks back at her tape recorder..."
links.text: She looks back at her tape recorder.

links.title: You: "(Let it go.) "Got it...""
links.text: (Let it go.) "Got it..."

links.title: Acele: "She looks back at her tape recorder..."
links.text: She looks back at her tape recorder.

links.title: You: ""I had some other questions." (Conc..."
links.text: "I had some other questions." (Conclude.)

dialogueTree.title: Acele: ""Well, it's just questioning, right..."
dialogueTree.text: "Well, it's just questioning, right? You're questioning me -- it's what cops do."

links.title: Drama: "Fast and clean! A good one. Can't q..."
links.text: Fast and clean! A good one. Can't quite say it's a lie, but feels like one. She's better at lying than she'd like everyone to know.

links.title: You: ""Have you been questioned before?""
links.text: "Have you been questioned before?"

links.title: Acele: ""Once or twice, yeah. I'm sorry I h..."
links.text: "Once or twice, yeah. I'm sorry I haven't had the *Revachol experience* they get east of the river."

links.title: You: ""What's east of the river?""
links.text: "What's east of the river?"

links.title: Acele: ""*Rich* people. Rich people are eas..."
links.text: "*Rich* people. Rich people are east of the river."

links.title: You: "(Look awestruck.) "Who are these *r..."
links.text: (Look awestruck.) "Who are these *rich people*? They sound wonderful! I'd like to be one too."

links.title: Acele: ""Good luck crossing that river on y..."
links.text: "Good luck crossing that river on your police salary then."

links.title: You: "(Sneer.) "I bet they're *really* ri..."
links.text: (Sneer.) "I bet they're *really* rich. They must be very special people to be so rich..."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, they are. And I'm scum.""
links.text: "Oh, they are. And I'm scum."

links.title: You: ""I'm scum too.""
links.text: "I'm scum too."

links.title: Acele: "She nods, apprehensively."
links.text: She nods, apprehensively.

links.title: You: ""You're not scum.""
links.text: "You're not scum."

links.title: Acele: ""Oh, but I am.""
links.text: "Oh, but I am."

links.title: You: "(Lean in and whisper.) "Let me gues..."
links.text: (Lean in and whisper.) "Let me guess, these rich people are not from around here..."

links.title: Acele: ""Aren't they?" She seems perplexed...."
links.text: "Aren't they?" She seems perplexed. "I thought they were as *Vacholiere* as any of us, just way richer."

links.title: You: ""Oh no, they're foreign bodies. Age..."
links.text: "Oh no, they're foreign bodies. Agents of international capital. You only need to look close enough."

links.title: Acele: ""Hmm..." She looks eastward. "Maybe..."
links.text: "Hmm..." She looks eastward. "Maybe you're right. Most of them do speak three languages."

links.title: You: ""Strange. The existence of rich peo..."
links.text: "Strange. The existence of rich people does not stir any emotions in me."

links.title: Acele: ""Bet they like it that way," she mu..."
links.text: "Bet they like it that way," she mutters. Quietly, under her breath.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""You *keep* them rich.""
links.text: "You *keep* them rich."

links.title: You: ""Oh, okay. Good to know.""
links.text: "Oh, okay. Good to know."

links.title: Acele: ""Yeah...""
links.text: "Yeah..."

links.title: You: ""So, what trouble you've gotten int..."
links.text: "So, what trouble you've gotten into -- with the police."

links.title: Acele: ""The usual. I had a shitty run as a..."
links.text: "The usual. I had a shitty run as a teenager."

links.title: You: ""What's *the usual*?""
links.text: "What's *the usual*?"

links.title: Acele: ""You know, drinking, getting into f..."
links.text: "You know, drinking, getting into fights. The ugly stuff that happens when you move out of your parents' place at thirteen. In Faubourg."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Interesting term. Time to glean som..."
links.text: Interesting term. Time to glean some knowledge!

links.title: You: ""Wait, what is *In Faubourg*?""
links.text: "Wait, what is *In Faubourg*?"

links.title: Acele: ""Is this a rhetorical question?""
links.text: "Is this a rhetorical question?"

links.title: You: ""No. I literally can't remember eve..."
links.text: "No. I literally can't remember even the most basic terms sometimes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm..." The lieutenant steps in. "..."
links.text: "Khm..." The lieutenant steps in. "Faubourg -- not *In Faubourg* -- is a massive banlieue south of Jamrock Quarter. It is the largest ghetto in Revachol -- possibly the world."

links.title: You: ""I *know* what Jamrock is but... le..."
links.text: "I *know* what Jamrock is but... let's say I didn't."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're Jamrock. Sort of. Martinaise..."
links.text: "We're Jamrock. Sort of. Martinaise is called North Jamrock sometimes. Jamrock is also a ghetto, only smaller than Faubourg."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Jamrock is a district of Revachol c..."
links.text: Jamrock is a district of Revachol comprised of the following quarters: Pox, Villalobos, Central Jamrock, Grand-Couron, Old South and the Valley of the Dogs. Learning is great!

links.title: Acele: ""C'mon, man. We're in it. This is N..."
links.text: "C'mon, man. We're in it. This is North Jamrock -- Martinaise. Sort of. The technicalities are confusing."

links.title: Acele: ""Okay... it's a huge ghetto just so..."
links.text: "Okay... it's a huge ghetto just south of Jamrock."

links.title: You: ""Why did you need to move out at su..."
links.text: "Why did you need to move out at such tender age?"

links.title: Acele: ""My dad was a drunk. Plus, I guess..."
links.text: "My dad was a drunk. Plus, I guess I just wanted to drink too, you know? Get my *party on*."

links.title: You: ""You know what? I think you've real..."
links.text: "You know what? I think you've really learned something from all those times you've been questioned. Some of your lies have been pretty good."

links.title: Acele: ""Um... thank you?""
links.text: "Um... thank you?"

links.title: Empathy: "The girl is truly proud of herself."
links.text: The girl is truly proud of herself.

links.title: You: ""Yes, I can't even remember how man..."
links.text: "Yes, I can't even remember how many you've told or which ones I picked up on. Now -- another question."

links.title: You: ""Lying to the police is nothing to..."
links.text: "Lying to the police is nothing to be proud of. Now, another question, if you can manage to tell the truth."

links.title: Acele: ""I'll try.""
links.text: "I'll try."

links.title: You: ""I get that. I'm a major party anim..."
links.text: "I get that. I'm a major party animal myself. MAJOR."

links.title: Acele: ""Alright..." She smiles a little, w..."
links.text: "Alright..." She smiles a little, without meaning to.

links.title: You: ""Drinking, partying and disco music..."
links.text: "Drinking, partying and disco music are bad for you. You should take me as a warning example."

links.title: Acele: "She nods, very cautiously."
links.text: She nods, very cautiously.

links.title: You: ""I had another question.""
links.text: "I had another question."

links.title: You: ""I had another question." (Conclude..."
links.text: "I had another question." (Conclude.)

links.title: You: ""We do, don't we? Mind if I questio..."
links.text: "We do, don't we? Mind if I question you some more?"
